content: arkhē: commencement, commandment > 2 principles in one, having place, taking place of authority, command, nomological principle
forever forgetting that when physis opposes thesis, tekhnē, nomos, these principles are not 1 or 2, they’re always more than 1 & more or less than 2 > all would be simple if opposition held
arkheion, house of commanders, guardians, of archons, whose documents speak the law

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: archives take place in a house arrest

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: shouldn’t be heterogeneity or secret in archive; archontic principle: gathering together of signs
documents in archive inhabit rare place, place of election, law & singularity intersect in privilege
democracy provides more access to archive [see p. 95 w/ dead father, brothers share archive]
no political power w/out control of archive, memory (patriarch)
deconstruction concerned w/ limits perceived to be insurmountable
the secret menaces the archive
secret menaces the archive
signature is btwn proper name & what it invented
archival violence: exergue, capitalize on ellipse, accumulates capital in advance, anticipates so to institute (Gewalt)
every archive at once institutive & conservative [see FL], revolutionary & traditional, an eco-nomic archive: keeps, puts in reserve, saves, but in unnatural fashion (forcing obedience to law)

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: question of the archive: where does the archive commence?

in Civilization & its Discontents, Freud does a captatio benevolentiae [re: diabolical death drive]: in the end I have nothing new to say, why archive this? would be pure loss (useless expenditure) [Derrida repeats gesture?] > radical perversion in this gesture: archive death drive as pure loss

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: death drive is anarchivic, archiviolithic
leaves no monument/document of its own > as inheritance, leaves on its erotic simulacrum (erogenous color draws mask on skin): origin of beautiful > memories of death
death drive destroys archives, anarchic, destroys its own trace, operates in silence
death drive incites annihilation of memory and commands the effacement [i.e. effacing nature] of supplement
archive requires repetition, repetition permits memory but is indissociable from death drive—so archive introduces forgetfulness, archiviolithic, always works against itself [auto-immunity]
no archive w/out outside, w/out technique of repetition
archive takes place at structural breakdown of memory, anamnesis (alive, internal, spontaneous) > archive is hypomnesic [hypomnēma] [pharmakon]
death drive destroys archive, unless it can be made up as idol, represented, painted, erotic simulacrum

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: death drive is archive fever, not a principle, aneconomy, threatens every principality, every archontic primacy, every archival desire: its silent vocation > burn the archive, incite amnesia, ruin archive as accumulation and capitalization of memory

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: is circumcision an exterior mark? is it an archive?
Jew (or Devil, radical evil, all which is irreconcilable to God in “Christian science”) can be reinvested as an economistic resource of an archive that capitalizes everything [Sagi]
devil can justify, such is destination of Jew in Aryan ideal
Freud’s Mystic Pad still participates in Cartesian space [FSW pp. 227-28] > do new archival machines (ones Freud could never dreamed of) change anything?
does the psyche transform w/ technological advancements or does it find itself better represented?

the prosthetic, hypomnesic techniques of archive not only place for storing, but also determine structure of the archivable content in its very coming into existence, in its relationship to the future
psychoanalysis formed in the time of postal delay
psychoanalysis formed in time of postal delay
archival technique: command that which in past instituted/constituted anticipation of the future
wager, pledge: token of the future
Freud’s 2 systems (Ucs & Pcs), 3 points of view (topic, dynamic, economic): that Freud integrates necessity of outside > prosthesis of the inside
radical evil & political-ethical questions (infinite threat of annihilation)
no archive drive w/out radical finitude, possibility of forgetfulness; death drive’s threat is infinite [radical evil], sweeps away logic of finitude, opens political-ethical questions
a document of an archive, leaves trace of incision right on skin [superficial, like literature] lips of a wound, pellicular superimposition [invagination & circumcision?]
circumcision carries literal singularity into figurality
bind anew: an act of love (paternal) (sous peau neuve)

lawmakers w/out which one can’t have archives, conservation (memory) puts into reserve (“store”), accumulates, capitalizes, stocks a quasi-infinity of layers (hypermnesic, hypomnesic epidermises of books & penises)
[iterability of circumcision] at once inaugural & recurrent
arca: cupboard, coffin, prison cell
entire economy of archival law found in these 2 words: memorial & reminder
the proper of the archive, its instant—certain hypomnesic, prosthetic experience of technical substrate [Derrida had this thought while tinkling on his Macintosh computer]
can one imagine an archive w/out foundation, w/out substance, w/out subjectile?
press “save” on computer > ensure indemnity, salvation

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: the 3 condensed meanings of word “impression”: 1. scriptural or typographic: mark on surface, on substrate, Freud’s Mystic Pad, difference btwn Verdrängung and Unterdrückung 2. “Freudian impression” of the archive, opposed to rigor of concept, “archive” only a notion [in psychoanlaysis], one not destined to some sin of nominalism but the possibility & future of the concept, very concept of the future 3. “Freudian impression” left by Sigmund Freud on himself, and on anyone who speaks about him, to be marked by Freud w/out knowing it
psychoanalysis is not a depth psychology
minimal archive: copy of an impression
to not take account of the Freudian impression [resistance], one confirms, countersigns (archives) his theory of “repression”
to have a concept: a closed heritage (seal of guarantee [see POO p. 20 “one and the same seal” “total and intact memory”])

archivology (interdisciplinary science of archive) risks being paralyzed in preliminary aporia: 1) treat psychoanalysis as general science of the archive 2) place itself under the critical authority of psychoanalysis (disputing it while integrating its logic)
w/out transgenerational memory (2 types: ancestral or biological), there would be no question of memory or archive
can one presuppose closure, identity of psychoanalytic corpus?
to know what archive means, we will only know in time to come: question of the future itself, of a response, promise, a responsibility for tomorrow (spectral messianicity at work in archive)
coup de foudre, love at first sight, love & transference, “what if” of the future in the instant
[re: Yerushalmi] he doesn’t mean to give but to give back, a masterly decipherment, give back to Freud his own competence [to read Hebrew]
scholar repeats the father’s circumcision [Yerushalmi calling Freud back to his father’s faith], even if only by figure
a scholar of the future, one who dares to speak to a ghost [see SPOM] (Marcellus to Horatio), speaking to ghosts conditions scholarship
juridical fiction produces continuity of fiction
Yerushalmi doesn’t treat Freud as a witness in the 3rd person (terstis), but as a 2nd person “called to witness” (incompatible w/ classical scientific discourse, history, philology)
common(unal) violence—inscribe the other as spectral/patriarchic nursling
“I shall say we” to a ghost or newborn > indestructible covenant, extraordinary performative (like a circumcision)
[re: 2 def. of circumcision] 1) symbolic substitute of castration of the son by primitive father (structural) 2) “conducting fossil” for investigating memory of heritage (historical)
anti-Semitic unconscious [re: Yerushalmi’s attempt to make psychoanalysis Jewish in the future, revealing “historical truth” of anti-Semitism]
via Yerushalmi, but w/ a Jewish science, archive becomes a founding moment for science as such
classically—science, philosophy, intrinsically independent of the singular archive of its history
uncontrollable undecidability in axiomatics of both Freud & Heidegger when they use the word unheimlich
[re: Freud/psychoanalysis] can a science depend on something like a circumcision?

[re: Yerushalmi] monolinguist who says “we” promises secrecy for a virtual response [re: Freud’s unknown conviction that psychoanalysis was a Jewish science], does Freud’s ghost murmur the secret in private [to Yerushalmi]?
maternity, as constructed as paternity [the usual thought is: mother real/ father figural], Freud makes a mistake in thinking only paternity is uncertain
Freud’s 3 errors, the 1st: patriarchy marks triumph of reason/science over senses
acc. Yerushalmi, psychoanalysis would be Judaism w/out God
Jewishness, openness to future [see p. 72]
Yerushalmi: Christianity as fratricide, kills elder son, Judaism, over possession of mother (mother as law)

discussing Yerushalmi, Derrida emphasizes essential modality “perhaps” for another reason than Nietzsche’s [courage of future philosopher to say perhaps] [elsewhere Derrida certainly emphasizes Nietzsche’s perhaps]
(what Yerushalmi wants from Freud, dying Freud [see POOF Aristotle’s dying sage says “friends, no friends”]) last word, last will, ultimate signature, uneffaceable countersignature
history: domination of constative over performative
Derrida will set up cartography of borders [Yerushalmi] assigns himself [to deconstruct them]
no objectivization is pure, nor in truth rigorously possible
first archivist—God?
first archivist—God?
Yerushalmi would like be the first after Freud, alone in sharing a secret, an inheritor in lineage of arch-patriarchs [re: knowing Freud knew psychoanalysis was a Jewish science]
deformations of text: murder
deformations of text: murder
mention rather than use [see POO p. 143n distinction still pragmatic], that the difference btwn mention & use must not be thematized is the secret
key as seal of arkheion, “deferred obedience”
question of the archive introduced by very stakes of vertiginous difference btwn [Freud’s] “material truth” & “historical truth” [Derrida also mentions Augustine’s “making truth”]
return of the repressed as triumph of life [re: Lou Andreas-Salomé’s reading in Moses], surviving of an excess of life which resists annihilation
ghost makes the law especially when you contest him [return of the repressed]
ghost can see you, you can’t see ghost
archival technē overflows singularity of event, i.e. the answering machine that outlives its moment of recording, the ghost speaks

if Yerushalmi believes that archivization & repression [re: killing of Moses] are irreducible, Derrida insists we can archive what we repress, that repression is archivization, that we can archive otherwise [animals can sign themselves as hidden]

repression dissimulates or encrypts the archives, archive of the virtual > virtuality removed from its oppositional coupling to actuality, effectivity, reality [re: full & effective actuality of an archived event]
archive of the virtual, “it’s time,” no distinction between act & power
can only illuminate, interpret an inheritance by inscribing oneself w/in it
no meta-archive

Derrida calls the 3 difference modalities [in Yerushalmi’s appeal to Freud] of same affirmation of future: doors, i.e. passage to “to come,” dreaming of Benjamin’s “narrow door” for passage of Messiah “at each second”
one cannot objectivize the archive [call on its names, employ it, make it gain in auctoritas] w/out remainder, archive produces more archive, never closed, opens to the future
affirmation of future to-come is affirmation itself, condition of all promises
how could someone who promises a secret to a specter still be a historian? [re: Yerushalmi]
no history or archive of the future to come [respect the future to come of the future to come]
Derrida identifies w/ Marranos (don’t tell anyone)
indetermination en abyme when Yerushalmi in-determines Jewishness & science one by the other

“if it is at all knowable,” an epochal suspension as energy of virtuality (energeia of a dynamis) [Agamben, Aristotle?], vertiginous, gives only condition of a future which remains to-come, messianic, an archive w/ no record of presence of what is or will have been “actually present” (distinguished radically from all messianism)
1st yes is promise, 2nd yes is engage; affirmation of affirmation, “inaugural engagement of a promise or of an anticipation which wagers, a priori, the very future”
is Jewishness the absolute uniqueness of this trait? to be open toward the future (à-venir), to be Jewish?: exemplary uniqueness of the trait d’union [btwn Jewishness & future]
1st yes is promise, 2nd yes engage
along with openness to future, via Yerushalmi, Jew has historicity, obligation of memory, of the archive
2 specificities, exclusivities, responsibilities, in absolute privilege of election
Yerushalmi: justice is the opposite of forgetting, the direction of memory
remember to remember the future, Yerushalmi: “only in Israel and nowhere else is the injunction to remember felt as a religious imperative to an entire people” [makes Derrida tremble]
Derrida trembles when Yerushalmi declares “only in Israel” [is there future, is there past], logic of election, question of proper name, exemplarity > place of all violences
if it is just to remember to guard and gather archive, it’s just as just to remember the others, tout autre est tout autre [invaginates]
injustice of the justice of the one, the unique, violence of unity

in response to Derrida’s statement that L’Un se garde de l’autre pour se faire violence can only be said/ thus archived so economically in French, Bennington wonders if Derrida committed violent election of the one: Derrida says he never spoke of absolute untranslatibility, and that his affirmation of idiomaticity is always one of deferral & impurity [both were ironic?]

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: if repetition is in the heart of future to-come, so is total annihilation of death drive

question of revelation (Offenbarung) or revealability (Offenbarkeit): does the event make the archivization possible? or vice versa? besides, the after-the-fact, the trace, Nachträglichkeit, disturbs the logic of the these two theses
in the structure of future to to-come
nomological arkhē, law of institution (thesis, nomos, themis) is thesis
spectral motif of archive stages disseminating fission, from which the archontic principle and concept of archive suffers
the structure of the archive is spectral [see p. 68]

Freud both accounted for ghosts, and tried to conjure them like Marx: [re: Gradiva’s ghost] Freud speaks of “real ghost,” and of a part of truth, the truth of delusion, haunted by specter of truth, truth is spectral as part of truth irreducible by explanation
haunting requires a home, a place, ghosts are sensitive to idioms, welcoming this one, allergic to that one > law of oikos, economy
Freud: “something in delusion that really deserves belief,” if it ever makes it into consciousness it is distorted, supplemented
“if I were doubly immodest”
archive always holds a problem for translation, it is repeatable and idiomatic
Freud made possible the idea of an archive with repression, subjective, hypomnesia, psychic spacing
[Freud oscillates btwn ana- and hypo- mnemic]
desire for archive: homesickness for the archaic place of absolute commencement > en mal d’archive [in need of archive, in archive fever, in death drive]
Freud’s outbidding, 3+1 prosthesis
archive radically incompatible, heterogenous, in divorce w/ arkhē
divorce of archive and archaeology, close, yet radically incompatible [against Foucault?]
nearly ecstatic instant Freud dreams of [re: Studies on Hysteria]: origin speaking by itself, arkhē appears in the nude, w/out archive, anamnēsis w/out hypomnēsis
archive made possible by destruction drive as originary finitude and expropriation, also no archive fever or desire w/out in-finite movement of radical destruction

belief, radical phenomenon of believing, the only relationship possible to the other as other has no irreducible place in Freudian psychoanalysis: Freud thinks one ought not to believe in ghosts [?] > archeological outbidding of a return to reality
no one deconstructed authority of archontic principle better than Freud

the archaic impression Freud seeks almost no longer an archive, confuses itself w/ a footstep that leaves its still living mark on surface [see POR p. 19 (154) seize inaudible in a sort of poetic telephony, see what makes sight see], place of origin, when step still one w/ subjectile
in Freud’s outbidding [see pp. 91-93 on 3 + 1 prostheses] wants to be an archivist more of an archaeologist than the archaeologist, exhume a more archaic impression

instant when imprint yet to be abandoned by pressure of impression, pure auto-affection, indistinction btwn touching/touched, active/passive, an archive that would confuse itself w/ arkhē ——Freud dreams irreplaceable place, the very ash, condition of singularity, idiom, secret, testimony, trace no longer distinguishes itself from substrate > absolutely safe location

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: holds, right on the ash, pressure of Gradiva’s so singular step
archive as history of every concept, all conception
when stones speak, when desire is revealed as a memory, moves us into the future
faithful memory of singularity is given over to the specter
“one can always dream or speculate around this secret account”—no archive of the secret, it is ash itself
singularity haunted by its own iterability, immanent divisibility, from the origin
unique is infinite “in the immense, incommensurable extent to which it remains unfindable”
no archive of the secret, by definition, it is the very ash of the archive (speculation begins there, belief too)
we’ll always wonder what in this mal d’archive did Freud burn, what may have burned of his secret passions, w/out him, w/out name, w/out symptom, w/out knowledge, w/out even an ash
[what did Freud keep of his] unconditional right to secrecy
